title: plugins文件夹得汉化插件配置文件中文字体乱码为什么？
author: dsqhxd
txt_content:
plugins文件夹得汉化插件配置文件中文字体乱码为什么？
例如localization.yml文件：
message:
  noPermission: "&7%tag &c\u6ca1\u6709\u6743\u9650: &b%extra"
  noConsole: "&7%tag &c\u65e0\u6cd5\u4f7f\u7528\u63a7\u5236\u53f0"
  notIntenger: "&7%tag &6%extra &cis \u4e0d\u662f\u4e00\u4e2a\u6574\u6570"
  command:
    unknown: '&7%tag &cUnknown command ''%extra'''
    give: '&7%tag &9/points give <name> <points>'
    take: '&7%tag &9/points take <name> <points>'
    look: '&7%tag &9/points look <name>'
    pay: '&7%tag &9/points give <name> <points>'
    set: '&7%tag &9/points set <name> <points>'
    reset: '&7%tag &9/points reset <name>'
    me: '&7%tag &9/points me'
  points:
    success: "&7%tag &9\u73a9\u5bb6 &a%player &9\u73b0\u5728\u62e5\u6709 &a%amount\
      \ &9\u70b9\u5377"
    fail: "&7%tag &c\u4ea4\u6613\u5931\u8d25"
    look: "&7%tag &9\u73a9\u5bb6 &a%player &9\u6709 &a%amount &9\u70b9\u5377"
    pay:
      send: "&7%tag &9\u4f60\u53d1\u9001\u4e86 &a%amount &9\u70b9\u5377\u7ed9 &a%player"
      receive: "&7%tag &9\u4f60\u6536\u5230\u4e86 &a%amount &9\u70b9\u5377 \u6765\u81ea\
        \ &a%player"
      invalid: "&7%tag &6\u65e0\u6cd5\u4ea4\u66130\u6216\u8005\u4ee5\u4e0b\u7684\u70b9\
        \u5377."
    lack: "&7%tag &6\u4f60\u6ca1\u6709\u8db3\u591f\u7684\u70b9\u5377!"
    reset: "&7%tag &9\u5df2\u91cd\u7f6e &a%player &9\u7684\u70b9\u5377"
    me: "&7%tag &9\u4f60\u73b0\u5728\u62e5\u6709 &a%amount &9\u70b9\u5377"
  help:
    header: "&9======= &7%tag \u6c49\u5316by:\u90b1&9======="
    me: "&7/points me &6: \u663e\u793a\u5f53\u524d\u70b9\u5377"
    give: "&7/points give <\u73a9\u5bb6> <\u70b9\u5377> &6: \u7ed9\u4e88\u8be5\u73a9\
      \u5bb6\u7684\u70b9\u5377"
    take: "&7/points take <\u73a9\u5bb6> <\u70b9\u5377> &6: \u6263\u6389\u8be5\u73a9\
      \u5bb6\u7684\u70b9\u5377"
    look: "&7/points look <\u73a9\u5bb6> &6: \u67e5\u8be2\u8be5\u73a9\u5bb6\u7684\u70b9\
      \u5377"
    set: "&7/points set <\u73a9\u5bb6> <\u70b9\u5377> &6: \u8bbe\u7f6e\u8be5\u73a9\
      \u5bb6\u7684\u70b9\u5377"
    reset: "&7/points reset <\u73a9\u5bb6> &6: \u91cd\u7f6e\u8be5\u73a9\u5bb6\u7684\
      \u70b9\u5377\u4e3a0"
    pay: "&7/points pay <\u73a9\u5bb6> <\u70b9\u5377> &6: \u8d60\u9001\u70b9\u5377\
      \u7ed9\u8be5\u73a9\u5bb6"
    lead: "&7/points lead [prev/next/page] &6: \u6392\u884c\u699c"

===========================================================================
求教。。。。

replies.author: john180
replies.txt_content: 中文内容被自动转换成了uncoide编码,不会影响游戏内显示的.

replies.author: dsqhxd
replies.txt_content: 咋没有人啊？补充，是启动一次服务器就变乱码了！

replies.author: 用笔写寂寞
replies.txt_content: 你问题不够详细，请问是什么插件

replies.author: zouchanglin
replies.txt_content: 虽然不知道是甚么插件，。不过游戏内应该不会乱码的。   。
目测你是用的1.7.10版本的服务端，这个会自动变成通用码的字符。1.7.10会自动转换的

replies.author: Yinyu
replies.txt_content:
Notepad++汉化
转到UTF-8编码格式即可
没有使用UT-8，请转换到UT-8编码
